dcterms:description: Thumos14 is a single-label dataset consisting of 13,000 videos from 20 classes, with 1,010 validation and 1,500 untrimmed test videos.

dcterms:description: Charades contains 66,500 annotations for 157 actions and is divided into 7,986 training and 1,863 validation multi-label videos.

dcterms:description: Animal Kingdom is a large multi-label dataset with over 50 hours of footage featuring wild animals from different classes and environments, consisting of 30,000 video sequences, including over 850 species.

dcterms:description: HMDB51 is a comprehensive compilation of original videos from various sources, including films and online videos, comprising 6,766 video clips spanning 51 different action categories.
